instruction: Summarize the usage of blockchain in the healthcare industry.
output: Blockchain is increasingly being used in the healthcare industry to enable secure and transparent data sharing between organizations and individuals. By providing a secure and decentralized way to store and transfer data, blockchain eliminates the need for third parties and makes sure that all users have view the same data sets. This enables easier data access and coordination between stakeholders, such as providers, health organizations, governments and patients. Furthermore, blockchain technology can improve patient privacy, as it allows individuals to control and shape the data that is being shared. In addition, blockchain can be used to create trustworthy audit trails and confirm the integrity of medical records.
